1. Now Support fonts:
Arial
Arial Narrow
Arial Black
Book Antiqua
Courier New
Garamond
Georgia
Lucida Console
Symbol
Times New Roman

2. if you want to add new fonts, please copy the *.afm files to 
path '$HOMEPATH/fonts/afm'.

3. Now just Support afm font files, if you have ttf files, please 
use the script '$HOMEPATH/src/ttf2afm.pl' to get 
afm files 

4. other format font files (like otf, bin, pfb, svg etc.), you 
must use other tools (http://www.zhuan-huan.com/font-converter.php) 
to turn it into afm format.
